name: GreenHouse17 Domestic Violence Hotline
description: 24/7 crisis hotline providing immediate support, safety planning, and resources for survivors of intimate partner abuse. Serves 17 counties in Kentucky with emergency shelter, advocacy services, support groups, and comprehensive domestic violence support. Offers confidential crisis intervention, safety planning, and referrals to local services.
source: Verified from official website and multiple sources
hours_of_operation: 24 hours a day, 7 days a week
eligibility_requirements: Survivors of intimate partner abuse and domestic violence
populations_served: Domestic violence survivors, families, children affected by domestic violence
notes: VERIFIED INFORMATION: All contact information verified on 2024-12-19. CITATIONS: Contact information verified from official website https://greenhouse17.org/. Phone number (800) 544-2022 confirmed as 24-hour crisis hotline from official website. Services and programs verified from main website and multiple search results. Organization serves 17 counties in Kentucky with comprehensive domestic violence services including shelter, advocacy, and support groups. All information cross-referenced with Google search results for consistency. This is a legitimate Kentucky-based domestic violence service organization.
